content.rendered: Horse racing is truly the sport of celebrity, extravagance, tradition and luxury. Nothing compares to seeing the world’s finest horses and jockeys racing for glory and each of the jewels in racing’s prestigious Triple Crown. Don those fabulous hats and seersucker suits and get ready for some of the most exciting moments in the world of racing. Roadtrips’ custom travel packages feature luxury and first class hotels as well as preferred seating to some of horse racing’s most exciting events of the year.
